description: Dashboard for Spring Boot2 Statistics(by micrometer-prometheus).

targets.expr: http_server_requests_seconds_sum{instance="$instance", appName="$application", exception="None", uri!~".*actuator.*", outcome="SUCCESS"} / http_server_requests_seconds_count{instance="$instance", appName="$application", exception="None", uri!~".*actuator.*", outcome="SUCCESS"}

panels.title: Kafka Total Records Consumed by InstanceId
Kafka Total Records Consumed by InstanceId

targets.expr: sum by (topic, instanceId) (kafka_consumer_records_lag_avg_records{appName="$application", env="$env", client_id!~".*restore.*", instance="$instance"})

panels.title: Kafka Consumer Average Lag by Records

title: MicroServices Drilldown Metrics
